about_the_game:
Exorcizamuste Demo is an action, horror, survival, puzzle solving and investigation demo.
You are a hunter of paranormal entities and you will go to places where these entities live and you will have to detect what type of beings they are and kill them. To achieve this task you will have a base of operations, tools and special weapons to do so.



  • Unique combats: Each type of paranormal being will have unique abilities, weaknesses and strengths when enraged and attacking.
  • Weapons: You will have a main weapon and a secondary weapon with different types of ammunition to be able to combat the different supernatural entities.



  • Terrifying experience: Realistic graphics and sounds and a totally immersive experience that will put your tension levels through the roof.
  • Unpredictable paranormal entities: You will never know what type of supernatural being awaits, nor what it is capable of.
  • Limited resources: The bullets and medicines available will not be unlimited. Neither do attacks you can resist.



  • Equipment: Use all your available equipment and objects to discover the clues and type of paranormal entity as soon as possible. You will have everything from a watch to measure electromagnetic frequencies and temperature to cameras with different types of vision.
  • Solve puzzles: The supernatural being will not be there waiting to be found. You must make your way by solving puzzles in the different locations until you find the origin of the entity.
  • Infinity of supernatural beings: Discover in this demo up to 2 types of paranormal beings that together with their subtypes make more than 30 beings with different personalities, behaviors and clues.

content_descriptors.notes: Sensitive content such as corpses, blood, and rotten items appear.
